an4.151:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these four faculties. What four? The faculty of faith, the faculty of energy, the faculty of mindfulness, and the faculty of concentration. These are the four faculties."[n.837] The usual list of faculties(indriya)and powers(bala)is fivefold, with wisdom(paññā)as the fifth. For definitions of the five faculties, see SN48:9–0. For the five powers, seeAN5.4.
